## Properties

| Property    | Attribute    | Description                         | Type      | Default     |
| ----------- | ------------ | ----------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `active`    | `active`     |                                     | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `itemTitle` | `item-title` | pass a title for the accordion item | `string`  | `undefined` |
